tool_description: Get Sea Surface Temperature for any location on the globe: current conditions, forecast, and historical data.
name: Sea Surface Temperature
title: Sea Surface Temperature

api_list.name: Historical Sea Temperature
api_list.description: Provides historical Sea Surface Temperature for the requested location and time interval. Historical data is available from 2010 until the current date. A requested interval can not exceed 31 days.

required_parameters.name: latlon
required_parameters.description:
Comma-separated values of the latitude and longitude of the requested location.
Allowed latitude values are in the range of -90..90. Allowed longitude values are in the range of -180..180.
If the requested location points to the land, the service will look for a nearby marine location within a few miles to provide the result.

required_parameters.name: startDate
required_parameters.description: Start date of the requested historical interval in the YYYYMMDD format.

required_parameters.name: endDate
required_parameters.description: End date of the requested historical interval in the YYYYMMDD format.

api_list.name: Current Sea Temperature
api_list.description: Provides current Sea Surface Temperature, historical data for the past three days, and forecast for the next three days.

required_parameters.name: latlon
required_parameters.description:
Comma-separated values of the latitude and longitude of the requested location.
Allowed latitude values are in the range of -90..90. Allowed longitude values are in the range of -180..180.
If the requested location points to the land, the service will look for a nearby marine location within a few miles to provide the result.

api_list.name: Sea temperature monthly averages
api_list.description: Returns min, max, and average Sea Surface Temperature for each month of the year.

required_parameters.name: latlon
required_parameters.description:
Comma-separated values of the latitude and longitude of the requested location.
Allowed latitude values are in the range of -90..90. Allowed longitude values are in the range of -180..180.
If the requested location points to the land, the service will look for a nearby marine location within a few miles to provide the result.
